participant_2.background:
I have a baby monitor with a camera so I can check on my child from anywhere in the house.
I am proud of the creative projects I have made in my studio.
I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists.
I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park.
I live a simple life, spending my days with my family and my vintage cars.

content.text: Great! My son just turned one, so I'm a little sleep deprived, but happy.
Oh congrats! I'm not a parent yet, but I can imagine the lack of sleep.
Yeah, it's tough, but it's worth it.
I'm sure! What do you like to do to relax?
I like to spend time in my studio, working on creative projects. I'm an upholsterer, and I've also done some commissions for comic book artists.
Wow, that's awesome! I love working on creative projects too.
What do you like to do?
I like to paint, and I also like to write.
That's great! I've always wanted to learn how to paint.
It's a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about creative projects.
Me too! I love seeing what other people are working on.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm going to visit my parents, and then I'm going to spend some time in my studio.
That sounds like a great plan! I hope you have a good time.
Thanks! I hope you do too
